flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

lines.text: You will need two pieces of wood  210x297mm (that’s the dimensions of A4 paper), three dowels (their length depends on how big your amp is), a hacksaw and a drill.
lines.text_raw: You will need two pieces of wood  210x297mm (that’s the dimensions of A4 paper), three dowels (their length depends on how big your amp is), a hacksaw and a drill.

lines.text: You will cut a triangle from its piece of wood and find some other use for it because we don’t need it.
lines.text_raw: You will cut a triangle from its piece of wood and find some other use for it because we don’t need it.

lines.text: Then you will need to drill three, I repeat, three holes. Not four holes, neither five; six is out of the question. Three will be the number of the holes that need to be drilled.
lines.text_raw: Then you will need to drill three, I repeat, three holes. Not four holes, neither five; six is out of the question. Three will be the number of the holes that need to be drilled.

lines.text: Once the holes are drilled (hopefully you used a drill that is big enough to accommodate the dowels), you insert the dowels in the holes, all three of them, and glue them. And you have the final product.
lines.text_raw: Once the holes are drilled (hopefully you used a drill that is big enough to accommodate the dowels), you insert the dowels in the holes, all three of them, and glue them. And you have the final product.

lines.text: The wood pieces are of A4 size so you can easily print the template. http://dl.dropbox.com/u/66138081/amp_bas...
lines.text_raw: The wood pieces are of A4 size so you can easily print the template. http://dl.dropbox.com/u/66138081/amp_base_template.jpg

lines.text: www.whatevermake.wordpress.com      for more projects and ideas .
lines.text_raw: www.whatevermake.wordpress.com      for more projects and ideas .

guide.summary: This is a very simple amp stand.
guide.title: Simple Bass Amp Stand
